PressureAverage< SystemType > Class Template Reference
Diagnostics

Detailed Description

template<class SystemType>
class McMd::PressureAverage< SystemType >

PressureAverage evaluates average pressure.

The SystemType may be McSystem and MdSystem. The use of a template is possible because both types of system use a similar interface.

void sample ( long  iStep) [virtual]

Calculate, analyze and/or output a physical quantity.

Take an action if iStep is a multiple of interval. If iStep is not a multiple of interval, this method should do nothing and return immediately.

Parameters:
iStepcurrent simulation step index.
